Procedure.Name: Org_Reddragonit_Dbpro_Connections_MsSql_ConvertBigintToCharstring
Procedure.Code: DECLARE @ret VARCHAR(50), @StringToHash VARCHAR(4000), @numVal INT, @counter INT; SET @counter = 1; SET @ret = ''; SET @StringToHash = CAST(@IntVal as VARCHAR(4000)); WHILE (@counter < LEN(@StringToHash)) BEGIN IF ((@counter+1)<LEN(@StringToHash BEGIN="" SET="" @numVal = "CAST(SUBSTRING(@StringToHash,@Counter,2") AS="" INT="" END="" ELSE="" BEGIN="" SET="" @numVal = "CAST(SUBSTRING(@StringToHash,@Counter,1") AS="" INT="" END="" SET="" @numVal = "@numVal" + 20="" IF="" (@numVal=""<48 BEGIN="" SET="" @numVal = "@numVal" + 28="" END="" IF="" (@numVal="" BETWEEN="" 58="" AND="" 64="" BEGIN="" SET="" @numVal = "@numVal" + 12="" END="" IF="" (@numVal="" BETWEEN="" 91="" AND="" 97="" BEGIN="" SET="" @numVal = "@numVal" + 12="" END="" IF="" (@numVal=""> 122) BEGIN SET @numVal = @numVal - 20; END IF (@numVal BETWEEN 58 AND 64) BEGIN SET @numVal = @numVal + 12; END IF (@numVal BETWEEN 91 AND 97) BEGIN SET @numVal = @numVal + 12; END SET @ret = @ret + CHAR(@numVal); SET @counter = @counter+1; END RETURN @ret;

Procedure.Name: Org_Reddragonit_Dbpro_Connections_MsSql_GeneateUniqueID
